thread.title: BRIEF-Qtone Education Group Guangdong sees FY 2017 net profit down 27.1 pct to 41.7 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Qtone Education Group Guangdong sees FY 2017 net profit down 27.1 pct to 41.7 pct

organizations.name: qtone education group guangdong co ltd

text:
Jan 29(Reuters) - Qtone Education Group Guangdong Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 27.1 percent to 41.7 percent, or to be 60 million yuan to 75 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 102.9 million yuan
* Says decreased investment income and increased expenses are the main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/wF7Umq
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
